action.script: function hookFetch() {var realFetch = window.fetch; window.fetch = function(url, init, ...args) {if (typeof url === 'string') {if (url.includes('gql')) {if (typeof init.headers['X-Device-Id'] === 'string') {init.headers['X-Device-Id'] = 'twitch-web-wall-mason';}if (typeof init.headers['Device-ID'] === 'string') {init.headers['Device-ID'] = 'twitch-web-wall-mason'; }}}return realFetch.apply(this, arguments);}}hookFetch();
